rules_text:
Heat of Potential deals 2 damage to any nonplayer target.
[i]Augmented[/i] – Heat of Potential deals 5 damage to that permanent instead if you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn.
flavor_text:
[i]“Fire has only one wish, and it's been granted.”
—Ovueli, New Tensuo mage[/i]
